page.title: 19School Camp,Mundesley,1985
page.content: On Friday we went to Great Yarmouth for the day.In the morning we went to a swimming pool which had a sloping beach and a wave machine.The wave machine was only on for ten minutes but it was very exciting.It tired us all out.We went to the Pleasure Beach in the afternoon.In the evening we went to a disco in Mundesley. On Saturday a ferry took us to see some seals on a mudbank and then to Blakeney Point Nature Reserve.The Warden showed us lots of interesting things,such as Tern's nests with eggs in them.In the evening there was a treasure hunt in Mundesley which our girls won. On Sunday we played on the beach and in the park.We had a swim in the sea. In the evening we all went to a bonfire on the beach. On Monday we went to Norwich.We went
